thread.section_title: DriveTime Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveTime | www.drivetime.com | 5 of 457
thread.title: Kristin Parker

author: Kristin Parker
title: Kristin Parker
text: After just walking out with my vehicle, I am beyond impressed with the customer service and the pleseant experience. Unlike just about every other dealership that we went to, they said that we are approved and then when we got there they wanted to trade off our one working vehicle or pay a crazy redicuculous. It was very nice to have someone follow through with their word and get it done!!
